description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Webasyst v.2.9.9 allows a remote attacker to run arbitrary code via the Instant messenger field in the Contact info function.

La vulnerabilidad de Cross Site Scripting en Webasyst v.2.9.9 permite a un atacante remoto ejecutar código arbitrario a través del campo de mensajería instantánea en la función de información de contacto.
